summary: TAKATA RECALL - MY TRUCK WAS RECALLED ON JUNE 1, 2016.  I HAVE RESEARCHED THROUGH FORD MOTOR COMPANY AND YOUR WEB SITE AND THIS TRUCK HAS BEEN IN USE IN ALABAMA (HIGH HEAT AND HUMIDITY) AND IS OLD (2007).  I AM THE ONE OWNER OF THIS VEHICLE SO ACCORDING TO YOUR CRITERIA, I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO WAIT OVER ONE YEAR FOR REPLACEMENT OF THIS DANGEROUS EQUIPMENT.  PLEASE INVESTIGATE AND PLEASE NOTIFY FORD MOTOR COMPANY TO FIX MY VEHICLE.  I WOULD SINCERELY APPRECIATE YOUR ATTENTION IN THIS MATTER.  THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.  [XXX]     INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
